short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract forecast data from Amazon Seller Central

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automation tools for Amazon sellers - Extract forecast data quickly and efficiently

Version 1.3.0 - UI Enhancement Update

What's New:
• Improved Side Panel Interface
  - More responsive layout that adapts to different panel sizes
  - Enhanced status badge with dynamic text handling
  - Compact header design for better space utilization

• Visual Improvements
  - Refined button styles and interactions
  - Smoother animations and transitions
  - Updated surfing icon animation
  - Better visual feedback for user actions

• Layout Optimizations
  - Improved status message display (supports single and multi-line text)
  - Better spacing and alignment throughout the interface
  - Enhanced readability of text elements

• Technical Improvements
  - Optimized CSS structure
  - Better handling of dynamic content
  - Improved responsive behavior

This update focuses on enhancing the user experience with a more polished and responsive interface while maintaining all the core functionality you rely on.
